Clipped from: [https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/index.htm](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/index.htm)

![George Padmore](data:image/png;base64,)

## 1902–1959

Never let it be forgotten that “Labour with a white skin cannot emancipate itself where labour with a black skin is branded.” [Marx, [Capital, Chapter 10](https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1867-c1/ch10.htm#161a), 1867]

[Biography](https://www.marxists.org/glossary/people/p/a.htm#padmore-george)

Works

[The Negro Liberation Movement and the International Conference](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1930/negro-liberation.htm), 1930

[The Life and Struggles of Negro Toilers](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1931/negro-toilers/index.htm), 1931

[“Left” Imperialism and the Negro Toilers](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1932/left-imp.htm), May 1932

[Fascism in the Colonies](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/fascism-colonies.htm), February 1938

[Hands Off the Colonies!](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/hands-off.htm), February 1938

[An Outrageous Report](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/outrageous-report.htm), March 1938

[Why Moors help Franco](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/moors-franco.htm), May 1938

[White Workers and Black](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/white-workers-black.htm), May 1938

[The Government’s Betrayal of the Protectorates](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/government-betrayal.htm), June 1938

[Labour Unrest in Jamaica](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/unrest-jamaica.htm), July 1938

[West Africans, Watch Your Land](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/west-africans.htm), September 1938

[Manifesto Against War](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1938/manifesto-iasb.htm), 25 September 1938

[Police Swoop On Workers’ Leaders In Colonies](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1939/police-swoop.htm), 20 October 1939

[The British Empire Is Worst Racket Yet Invented By Man](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1939/worst-racket.htm), 15 December 1939

[Hands Off the Soviet Union](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/hands-off-soviets.htm), February 1940

[Hands Off the Soviet Union!](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/02/handsoff.html) (abridged form of above), 24 February 1940

[Black Colonials Call on British Masses to Revolt](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/05/revolt.html), 1 May 1940 (with Jomo Kenyatta, Chris Jones & Wal Daniels)

[Poverty, Disease Is Native’s Lot in West Indies](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/06/windies.htm), 17 June 1940

[West Indies Need Independence – Not Big Reports](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/06/windies2.htm), 24 June 1940

[A Typical British Colony](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1940/12/colony.htm), December 1940

[British Imperialists Treat the Negro Masses Like Nazis Treat the Jews](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/xx/britimp.htm), 1941

[Empire “Gauleiters” Greet Each Other](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/gauleiters.htm), January 1941

[West Indians Answer Anglo-U.S. Imperialism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/01/windians.htm), 4 January 1941

[A Typical British Colony](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/xx/britcolony.htm), 1 February 1941

[Whither the West Indies?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/07/windies.htm), 21 July 1941

[Britain’s Black Record](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/xx/black.htm), September 1941

[The Socialist Attitude to the Invasion of the U.S.S.R.](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/invasion-ussr.htm), September 1941

[Answers to a Questionnaire on the War](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1941/questionaire.htm), November 1941

[Atlantic Charter Not Intended for Colonies](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1942/01/notforcolonies.htm), 24 January 1942

[Blue-Print of Post-War Anglo-American Imperialism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1943/blue-print.htm), October 1943

[Imperialism: The Basis of Labour Party Crisis](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1944/labour-crisis.htm), June 1944

[Chris Jones: Fighter for the Oppressed](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1944/chris-jones.htm), September 1944

[A Political Review of the Colonies](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1945/review-colonies.htm), February 1945

[The Voice of Coloured Labour](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1945/labour-congress/index.htm), World Trade Union Conference, 1945

[Colonial and Coloured Unity](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1947/pan-african-congress/index.htm), History of the Pan-African Congress, 1947

[Madagascar Fights for Freedom](https://www.marxists.org/archive/padmore/1947/madagascar.htm), October 1947
